website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive CD player that has good sound but has trouble blocking out background noise.
pros: Simple features are easy to use
Great option to keep in your backpack, briefcase, or purse
cons: Some units stop working after a short time

customer_reviews.title: DC not AC
customer_reviews.text: Price is good. A question was posted asking if it runs on AC power, I am posting a picture to answer that question because I'm not sure the question is answered correctly? And it is not supplied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: webeblums

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: This one skips at the slightest little movement. It eats batteries. They don’t last 2 hours. The springs that keep the batteries loaded are crooked making the batteries hard to put in. It’s a far cry from what I’ve had before. I’m tossing it and looking for a better player.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor product.
customer_reviews.text: Would never recommend this product. Did not work but a little over month. Have tried to contact company, but this seems to be impossible. All I want is a refund so I can find a cd player that works. Very unhappy with this experience. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: It was my mistake not to open and and try immediately (I really didn't think that there are might be problems, since that technology is so old and always used to work well - I mean CD players), so 30 days of return passed... Anyways, after a month I finally opened the box to try out my new CD player.... well, funny thing, it doesn't even open (yes, I out batteries in). The open button is broken (it makes some noise when I press it, but nothing happens), so I don't even know if it plays CDs. Can it fail even more?
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Player works great! I actually didn't look close enough when I bought it, but the player that I've been using that's going out is the same exact brand, ;-) Brand new, out of the package, the disc player works great! The previous one also got a little damaged on the opening hatch, but the new one opens nice and smooth. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey  Elya

customer_reviews.title: They made it RIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I orderd this with some audio cables. The cables worked great. This cd player never worked at all. All it does is show an error on display and shut it self off. The 5 cd's i tried work fine in my computor and in my car player. I will be returning it later this week. Please forgive spelling errors. I'm an old geizer and just not feeling extra good tonight.......S I just now was emailed by the seller. They have issued a full refund and decided not too bother with the return. Very comendable customer service!!! While i can't recomend the product. I can strongly recomend the seller and would trust them again......S
customer_reviews.author: spuriousmonk

customer_reviews.title: It broke when she first went to use it. ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke when she first went to use it. I'm in Tampa and she's in Chicago. She was born with Down Syndrome and she wanted to listen to her music but because it broke, she can't. The first one she bought at Walmart and it broke as well. I won't see her until Christmas. Do you want me to send it back then. It's rediculous that I'm paying for something that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Do-do

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the package it did not work, wouldn’t read my CDs. I have regressed back to my CDs as they sound so much better than my iPod or what have you. I still have my old Philips CD player and it works great. Have been looking for a back up (just in case) and this sure wasn’t it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gwert

customer_reviews.title: good for audio books
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for audio books. CD players are difficult to find in stores anymore, so thankful for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mcls

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The CD door OPEN button does not work so I have to force it open with my fingers and the lid is uneven so you can hear it clacking against its uneven sides. I knew that what I was purchasing wasn't a state of the art CD player but I was disappointed in general. At least it plays the CD well so I'm grateful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Its a good cd player
customer_reviews.text: This cd player is simple and practical and works well. I bought a new truck that doesn't come with a cd player cause everything is streamed and blue tooth in todays world. I have a cd collection and this was the solution. I plan on purchasing a couple more just so I have them in case I ware this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas gift for our 8 year old daughter with a bunch of old cds from the 90's-2000. Works AWESOME! Bass boost difference is intense. Batteries still haven't died and she listens to that thing all day everywhere we go! Great buy in my book!
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's light and simple. The only thing is it has a bit of background noise not sure what you call that. Like a "shhhhhh" noise. As I am listening while travelling it does not bother me too much but if you listen in silence you can hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked at all
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like anything about it. I purchased it as a gift for my wide thinking that Jensen was a decent brand. She wanted one for listening to audiobooks. I had it for a few months before giving it to her. By the time she used it the window for returns was done. We tried everything, read the manual, etc... no luck. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Jahile

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive cd player
customer_reviews.text: I received The Lord of the Rings on CD as a birthday present. I have a cd player attached to the Room stereo; but wanted one like this for privately listening to this audiobook. It fits the bill nicely. Excellent sound, and so far, it has not skipped while playing. Good value for the money. It does not come with an A/C adapter; but one can be purchased separately. I have just been using batteries and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence H. Snoots

customer_reviews.title: it was fine. Battery-run
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with an SAT language subject test. Otherwise, it isn't getting much use. But for the purpose, it was fine. Battery-run, easy to use, portable and fits the requirements. Testing day went off without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: kbirdlincoln

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is ac adoptable (not included)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to be able to play my audio books with. Love that it is ac adoptable (not included), to have that function is not easy to find with portables. Arrived sooner than expected. I plug in a speaker where the headphone jack is located and it sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: news cars don't have cd players this just plugs right in to them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic, inexpensive, but reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a ‘dumb’ CD player for work. It plays CD’s, an makes the day more bearable. It’s got a little hiss even when on pause, but once the music is playing, it’s not as noticeable. If it were serious, expensive hardware I would have rated it lower, but for the price, it’s fine, a basic CD player
customer_reviews.author: James H. Schober

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather spend a few bucks more and get something ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd rather spend a few bucks more and get something that had some quality about it! I have always been a user and backer of Jensen products, but this time I'm gonna stay out of this gunfight! I can't notice ANY difference in the bass boost, sounds the same. Sporadic operation!
customer_reviews.author: G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: So my cd player went out in my car so since I dont listen to all that many cds I decided to go this route. Mistake. It constantly skips and pauses. Even took it out of the car and tried it in the house, still skips and pauses throughout playing cds. I recommend paying the extra and getting a Sony brand. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry P

customer_reviews.title: Good CD player, terrible radio
customer_reviews.text: I can say that this is a CD player and it does play CDs just fine. The radio as far as reception goes, is comparable to something from 1995. I had a CD player with AM/FM radio in 2006 that got better reception on stations originating from the city I am listening to it in, than this one does today. Get a better CD player radio, this is getting what I paid for, not much.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Grant

customer_reviews.title: Best technology of the early 1990s!
customer_reviews.text: Bass boost, ESP and Compact Disc reading technology! What more could you ask for? This is bleeding edge technology folks. You'll be the envy of all your friends when you roll up wearing a discman on your hip. And don't worry about skipping, you've got ESP on this baby. Toss 'er in your fanny pack, run your fingers through your bowl cut. You're now the life of the party! But in all honesty, it's a solid cd player, if you have need for that kind of thing. I bought a generic wall plug so I don't eat up batteries and it works great. 10/10 would cd player again.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in car when onboard unit is out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for use in car when onboard unit is out of order. I plug it in the "aux" and with the ESP on the portable, I'm back in business and save the $400.00+ the dealer wants to replace the car's cd player.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon E Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my Dad to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 94 year old Dad to listen to audio books as his vision is severely impaired. He missed reading his Bible and really enjoys bro g able to do that his audio. Simple to operate and good sound quality through headset.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Refused to play on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The player arrived and all seemed fine, no scratches or damages. But it refused to play any CD I tried to put in. The button to open up the player was difficult to open as well. I suppose you pay for quality. The instructions claim that it might be the CD that's the issue instead of the player, simply putting blame on someone else's product instead of their own. I've tested the CDs in another player and they work fine. No reason whatsoever should an error message be popping up.
customer_reviews.author: Julia P

customer_reviews.title: No power cord and eats a set of batteries per use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit, but had to return it. I went through a set of batteries for every 2 hours of use. Its a battery eating monster. If you get a power cord, it would be great. I got a phillips. Im still one the first set of batteries. Its been a couple fo sweets of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have had Jensen CD players in the past, which is why I chose this player. I am disappointed with this player, as background noises are loud and the disc seem to skip and are scratchy sounding.
customer_reviews.author: KatieRose

customer_reviews.title: tried different CD-NOTHING~WHAT A MAJOR DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: Was going on vacation and wanted to listen to my cd's, so decided that ordering a Jensen would be a safe bet! WAS I WRONG! Item arrived and put in the batteries, and inserted a CD, and NOTHING! the unit appeared to be playing the Cd, but no music. tried a different set of ear phones--NOTHING! tried different CD-NOTHING~WHAT A MAJOR DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: fragile be careful breaks really easy
customer_reviews.text: The cover that you open to put your CD in and out broke off before I could listen to the second CD the quality is unsatisfactory and cheap I don't recommend buying this unless you are extremely careful with it fragile is an understatement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cd player
customer_reviews.text: This was my second portable CD player to purchase in the first one was very poor quality but the Jensen works really well and it’s easy to use but the only downfall is the batteries don’t last long you have to use the AC DC charger for longer periods of listening.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: CD player doesn't play all my CD's
customer_reviews.text: This CD player does not play all CD's. If you have any that are recorded they may not play in this player. I am disappointed because this was what I purchased it for. Also it feels as if after closing the player that it will open while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: It plays CD's...that's about all. Get only what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Hey it plays CD's.......the LCD display is a bit on the small size and the molded in key ID's are a pain unless you got the right light and a magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Pixelman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom who is in a nursing home and after 5 months it just stopped working, I guess I didn’t expect much for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Palmer-rosales

customer_reviews.title: My kids had no idea what this was and thoought it was cool. lol
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a college class. My kids had no idea what this was and thoought it was cool. lol lol
customer_reviews.author: Alyshia ramon

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is par for the price, but has a bit of noise from the unit itself. The top cover is quite difficult to pop open with the release button. The bass boost is worth having but a bit too boomy. The supplied earbuds are useless for my human ears, just don't fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Farruggella

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 1 star because there is no option to give 0. Don’t buy this. I got 3 for my kids to listen to audio books in the car. 2 our if 3 stopped functioning completely. The 3rd sometimes works, sometimes doesn’t it. Yes, it was cheap- but not cheap enough for the circle of nothingness that it is able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Paige Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD player
customer_reviews.text: This CD player is quite good. The tone is excellent and rivals my 500watt speakers. I would give it five stars except the button symbols are hard to see, and the FM radio does not work on the unit I received. Everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The price was reasonable it works great. No skipping when I out for my walks or on the treadmill at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: William Beswick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It works :) But the quality is very flimsy and cheap and the earbuds are horribly uncomfortable. The price is a bit much for such a cheap quality CD player. Shipping was slow.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Total Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This CD player is a total piece of junk. The number one problem being that the "bass boost" is permanent - you can't shut it off. And what makes that "feature" truly lousy is that it's the worst bass boost I've ever heard - turning music into unlistenable sonic mud. You owe me one, Amazon. The only reason I haven't returned it for a refund is because I had it for three months before I ever opened the package and tried it. Maybe you still will give a refund?? Can I beat it with a sledgehammer first before returning it?
customer_reviews.author: Ric G

customer_reviews.title: Pay a bit extra and buy american.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poor.it went bad almost immediately.china sends America bad consumer electronics.this is not my first nexa product. and they have all been of poor quality and a waste of money. I have purchased a boom box with no head phone jack and a mini stereo with minimal amp. Power. Not even 5 watts. I have been stolen from and cheated and hate Chinese consumer electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful paper weight!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, wait, that's not what it was meant for? Oh . . . . well . . . *cough* Wouldn't even turn on? Parts are loose, fresh out the box? . . . . . .not like I needed it for homework or anything . . . Oh wait . . . . I did
customer_reviews.author: Bianca M Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Never played 1 tune
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time. Spins, but won't play any disk pro-made or home-made. Displays message "Err" no matter what disk I put in it. Junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Pontiac Pete

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning I had problems getting this CD player to open. I had to pry it open with my finger nail. Then it stopped working after 1 week. I was able to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: I guess u get what u pay for... this item hasn't worked since 15 min after we opened it, couldn't even het thru a whole cd!!!
customer_reviews.author: april collier

customer_reviews.title: Good CD player for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit for the price! Sounds good. A bit confusing with small control buttons, especially in the dark. Both ear buds are marked "R" for right channel sounds; could be annoying if you listen to a familiar piece and know which direction the sound is supposed to come from.
customer_reviews.author: Seano

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: When I travel I take my portable CD player and listen to audio books to go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the display already broken. I can’t see anything in the display - totally useless now. The headphones are extremely poorly made and do not provide very good audio. There is a hiss in the background when I play a cd, and I’m unclear if this is the player or the headphones. The CD player is so light that it feels flimsy and easily breakable (mine did arrive broken so...).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basic player!
customer_reviews.text: Great basic CD player. I had to purchase as my 17yo CD pkayer/alarm clock wont play newer CD's!! Wish this CD player came with more comfortable ear buds, but an easy fix since I have extras.
customer_reviews.author: H.Kim21

customer_reviews.title: waste of a paper bag
customer_reviews.text: the batteries outlasted the cd player. what a piece of junk. not even 4 hrs worth of playing. Jenson stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a time.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a time until it was dropped twice and then it will not shut off. Drains the batteries pretty quickly after that. In other environments it might fair better but for a older generation that is not so gentle its not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: RDMotors

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in my truck after I found the cables and power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Galinat

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Replacement item after owner 4 year old drop her two year old Jenson CD player would not compromise even for a Sony player had to replace it with a Jensen PRSNL CD PLYR Bass Boost happy kid.
customer_reviews.author: mig

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY EATER
customer_reviews.text: EATS BATTERIES. A DREADFUL PRODUCT WORTHY ONLY FOR THE TRASH.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a year, it's done. A while back one of the ear buds quit working. I tried a better pair, but they buzzed (as other reviews mentioned). It suddenly quit working. I should have put more money into one that would function well.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: This is what I need to listen to my books on CD very efficient
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S in the south

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your money
customer_reviews.text: dont buy this product. I have had it for about 4 months and its broken. Its garbage dont waste your money on this. Batteries die quickly and its difficult to turn on and off. Mine just stopped working for no reason. I would never ever ever buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jensen PRSNL CD Player works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, but the receiver said she loved it and has used it while traveling on bus tours with good results. She says it does not "skip" when jarred and plays all her CD:'s great.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase THIS!
customer_reviews.text: It broke the day after the return window closed. I was very careful with it. This thing is a piece of crap! You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: venuschild1968

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don't last long!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice portable CD player, but the batteries wear out so quickly! It's not worth using it! Huge disappointment after all the positive reviews I read. I really need to buy an adapter so I can plug it into my car to charge.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Worked once and then died, replaced with new batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked once and then died , replaced with new batteries nothing, purchased dc plug and again nothing just a humming sound. and then it shuts down. I also tried varies CD's. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work and I am returning. Plays for 30 seconds and shuts off. Tried using new batteries and using an electrical adapter. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: skmlc

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I had 3-4 players and they all died after a few years. So this one is average also. BUT I am a heavy user. I'd advise buying rather risk buying a more expensive with the same results!
customer_reviews.author: Stan M.

customer_reviews.title: This i junk
customer_reviews.text: this does not work. makes a clicking sound like it is stuck. It has never worked. DoNotBUY.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for One-Eared Music Fans!!
customer_reviews.text: The CD player had almost everything I was looking for. Except for no line out and no music in half of my headphones. So, more accurately, the CD player was one step away from being nothing at all that I was looking for. It's in the trash now. I contacted the people who sold it to me. Maybe they will respond before trash day.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Borman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this CD player and neither worked. The play button appears to work for a moment and then the player turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Make me feel like im floating on a cloud relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I put my plugs in ear and im lock into solute with my music. Make me feel like im floating on a cloud relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH GREGORY

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I like the bass function. I plan to buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie T

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: I had this for 3 hours played 1 brand new dvd and it stopped playing after 20 minuets. So frustrating!! Cheap crap don’t waste your money or time!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not!
customer_reviews.text: Cr@&....but got a good price!....stopped working after 30. mins....may have worked if I stayed very still & placed it on a level, horizontal surface...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Using batteries along. This CD player isn't great. It played 1 CD and only 5 songs before the batteries died. Not worth it. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Madysen

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Never even worked. We took it on a road trip for our kids to use and by the time we got back the return window had closed so we can't even get a replacement or refund. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work changed batteries 3 times and still it ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work changed batteries 3 times and still it starts and couple of mins later it’s shuts down. I would not ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the small price I paid!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cd player with anti-skip. BUT needs a bass boost function switch/button! It has no bass boost or high bass option.
customer_reviews.author: Lost

customer_reviews.title: opening door
customer_reviews.text: cd played good with bass boost problem was opening the door, had to pry open with open button pushed.an accident waiting!
customer_reviews.author: loretta a parente

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a student in my class from another country to listen to the alphabet. It was very hard to open and it worked one day and then would not play.
customer_reviews.author: P Bethany

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk that stopped working within a few months
customer_reviews.text: The DC port to operate the CD player using 110V electricity became damaged within a few months of purchase. The unit did not work with batteries either. That made the CD player impossible to use. A total waste!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't move it
customer_reviews.text: When the CD layer moves the sound is interrupted. Not a stable player.
customer_reviews.author: RMD

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the Jensen CD players
customer_reviews.text: This time around each CD player was well wrapped and placed in a small box before being placed in another box which was the perfect fit for them not to be bounced around. I played each one to double check and each one was exactly what I was looking for: a player which was easy to manipulate and could stand shock to a reasonable degree, good sound and easy to understand the mechanics of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Mom to be able to listen to some books on CD as she is sight impaired. She used it six times and then it just completely stopped working. It won't even power on. Don't waste your time with this product, it isn't worth it. Should have just invested more and bought a better product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good for books C D
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good product and was every thing that I expected
customer_reviews.author: Feehan Fan

customer_reviews.title: Low cost but very decent sound.
customer_reviews.text: I still have some old CD's I like to listen to. This portable player does the job. Nice, decent sound for the money.
customer_reviews.author: stephen j devincenzo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the package. Not worth the trouble or expense to send back. Jensen used to be good quality but not anymore
customer_reviews.author: David Latham

customer_reviews.title: Works real well.  I like the fact that I can move around with it and have it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little CD player. I like the fact that I can move around with it and have it in my sweatshirt pocket, without having it Skip. It’s certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sigel

customer_reviews.title: Peace
customer_reviews.text: I love my CDs, great for creating your own place
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble sleeping because of pain so I listen to audio books when I can't sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I keep music playing through a portable CD player a lot. I hook them up to tiny speakers and I tend to wear the players out quickly. This device has identical functions to other players like it but has lasted much longer than most previous brands I have tried. I am going longer without replacing.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: It will not work. I have tried it twice. It will play a couple of songs and then just stop. I am very upset and plan to return. And the Ads play fine in my other CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a zero if I could. It does not work. It is a piece of crap. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: A fragile cd player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife. It worked well until she dropped it on a carpeted floor and the cheap plastic hinges broke.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Driskill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This CD player has good sound. I thought it said in the description that it had fm radio also. It does not, but I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Aries

customer_reviews.title: It is defective
customer_reviews.text: Delivery on time but when I opened the CD player i noticed the top n bottom of CD player was not connected it snapped together when u press on it but then comes apart it works but not happy with it i don't want to return it because it probably cost to much u decide what u want to do about it really unsatisfied,thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Costilla

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Arrived used and broken. Even had old batteries in it. Crap Ola.!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Second time i have contacted you about this cd playeer
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it had a external speaker but it didn't I sent a message to get my money back in June but never hear from this message, it al skips when I did use it and the ear plugs don't stay in I put it on a shelf and forgot about it but now my daughter went to use it and I remember what was wrong sdboyd12@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the lid broke
customer_reviews.text: all of sudden, the whole lid broke off, now its useless
customer_reviews.author: CK in VA

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Portable CD for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit that I use for traveling. It comes with a wide variety off accessories and chargers. I use my own DJ Type headphones as I'm not wild about earbuds. The sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: nice cd player for the price
customer_reviews.text: lid spring broke right away but can manually lift the lit to put CD's inside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered and returned CD portable players from other retail stores.... THIS IS PERFECT!!! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sadia Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice cd player
customer_reviews.text: Just use better headphones than the ones that come with it
customer_reviews.author: mark
